title: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports annually relating to diversity within state government
summary: Directs the president of the state civil service commission to publish reports annually relating to diversity within state government.

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WRIGHT -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Governmental Employees

       AN ACT in relation to directing the president of the state civil service
         commission  to  publish reports relating to diversity within the state
         government

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The president of the state civil service commission within
    2  the department of civil service is hereby directed to study and  publish
    3  annual reports recording data relating to diversity within the state and
    4  civil  divisions  thereof as well as appointments to all state agencies,
    5  authorities, boards, bureaus, commissions, departments and divisions.
    6    The president of the state civil  service  commission  shall  annually
    7  publish  such  reports  and  findings. Such reports shall be sent to the
    8  chair of the senate standing committee on investigations and  government
    9  operations  and  to  the  chair  of  the  assembly standing committee on
   10  governmental employees no later than the first of February in each year.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
